Allen Iverson scored 33 points, JR Smith added 24 off the bench and the Nuggets overcame a 16-point deficit in the first quarter to win their playoff showdown with the Warriors 114-105 Thursday night. Everybody knew what was at stake, Allen Iverson said. "It's easy for players to say it's just another game. But everybody knows it wasn't just another game. The prime minister's spokesman said today: The position at the present time is that the Crown Prosecution Service are carrying out an assessment of the information that is held by the Metropolitan police. That process is under way and it is up to the CPS to make a decision on their assessment. The prime minister's position is that if there are allegations of illegal behaviour, then those allegations need to be taken very seriously, but in all cases it is a matter for the police and the CPS.
